org.terrier.indexing

Class TermPayloadSinglePassIndexer<PAYLOAD>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.indexing.Indexer
      • org.terrier.indexing.BasicIndexer
        • org.terrier.indexing.BasicSinglePassIndexer
          • org.terrier.indexing.ExtensibleSinglePassIndexer
            • org.terrier.indexing.TermPayloadSinglePassIndexer<PAYLOAD>
  • Type Parameters:
    PAYLOAD - the payload type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NNSinglePassIndexer, PositionSinglePassIndexer

    public class TermPayloadSinglePassIndexer<PAYLOAD>
extends org.terrier.indexing.ExtensibleSinglePassIndexer
    A single-pass indexer capable of adding term payload information to each posting.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare
    See Also:
    BasicSinglePassIndexer

      • TermPayloadSinglePassIndexer

        public TermPayloadSinglePassIndexer(String pathname,
                            String prefix,
                            TermPayloadCoordinator<PAYLOAD> payloadConf)
        Constructs an instance of a TermPayloadSinglePassIndexer, using the given path name for storing the data structures and TermPayloadCoordinator for controlling what and how payloads will be written to the index.
        Parameters:
        pathname - String the path where the data structures will be created. This is assumed to be absolute.
        prefix - String the prefix of the index, usually "data".
        payloadConf - the payload coordinator
